841766737061740574.name: Raft
841766737061740574.detailed_description:
By yourself or with friends, your mission is to survive an epic oceanic adventure across
a perilous sea! Gather debris to survive, expand your raft and set sail towards forgotten and dangerous islands!


Trapped on a small raft with nothing but a hook made of old plastic, players awake on a vast,
blue ocean totally alone and with no land in sight! With a dry throat and an empty stomach,
survival will not be easy!

Raft™ throws you and your friends into an epic adventure out on the big open sea, with the
objective to stay alive, gather resources and build yourself a floating home worthy of
survival.

Resources are tough to come by at sea: Players will have to make sure to catch whatever debris floats by using their trusty hook and when possible, scavenge the reefs beneath the waves and the islands above.
However, thirst and hunger is not the only danger in the ocean… watch out for the man-
eating shark determined to end your voyage!

Find the last parts of civilization still above water. Overcome the challenges therein, uncover the story of its previous inhabitants and find your way to the next destination!

Features:
● Multiplayer! Survive by yourself or with friends in online co-op!
● Hook! Use your hook to catch debris floating by.
● Craft! Build survival equipment, weapons, crop plots and more to help you stay alive!
● Build! Expand your raft from a simple wreckage to a buoyant mansion.
● Research! Learn new things to craft in the research table.
● Navigate! Sail your raft towards new destinations and overcome their challenges, uncover their story and find new items to help you on your journey!
● Dive! Drop anchor and explore the depths for more resources.
● Fight! Defend your raft from the dangers of the ocean and fight your way through perilous destinations.
● Farm and cook! Grow crops, catch and tend to animals, cook recipes and make tasty smoothies to keep your stomach happy.

841766737061740574.short_description: Raft™ throws you and your friends into an epic oceanic adventure! Alone or together, players battle to survive a perilous voyage across a vast sea! Gather debris, scavenge reefs and build your own floating home, but be wary of the man-eating sharks!
841766737061740574.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Swedish
*languages with full audio support

  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.6GHz or similar
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 700 series or similar

  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 series or similar
  • DirectX: Version 11

841766737061740574.name: Among Trees
841766737061740574.detailed_description:
EXPLORE

Explore a living, colorful world, ranging from dense forests to dark caves.

BUILD

Your cabin grows with you: build new rooms to unlock additional game mechanics, including cooking, gardening, crafting and sewing.

GROW

Nurture delicate (and delicious) plants in your greenhouse. Eat them raw or make a stew for better nutritional values.

SURVIVE

Dangerous animals roam some areas in the woods. Better keep a distance if you can.
(Among Trees also includes a ZEN mode without dangerous animals)

BEST FRIENDS FOREVER

While the wilderness can be dangerous, it doesn't mean you can’t make new friends. Adopt a Fox Pet who you can feed, pet, and train to help you find loot.
841766737061740574.about_the_game:

841766737061740574.short_description: Escape to an enchanting, living sandbox surrounded by wildlife and nature. Scavenge materials and craft tools to turn your small cabin into a warm, well-supplied home. Survive by fishing, cooking and growing your own food. Be careful though, the forest is as dangerous as it is wonderful.
841766737061740574.reviews:
“So beautiful that it makes you forget the constant dangers...”
GamesRadar+

“Among Trees manages to present a serene slice of nature that most people probably wouldn't mind losing themselves in.”
Eurogamer

“If you're down for a laid-back forest hiking game and you enjoy charting your own course just for the heck of it, give it a chance.”
Destructoid

841766737061740574.name: Slackers - Carts of Glory
841766737061740574.detailed_description:
When the drinks stop flowing and the city store's closing its doors, who are you gonna call to save the day? Come roll with our crew of laid-back slackers, ready to turn chaos into glory, and possibly not into a disaster!!!



Welcome in the wonderful and crazy world of Slackers!

Race solo or with your friends in one of the most reckless downhill rides ever! Discover and master the unpredictable and unique movements of a shopping cart, find your shortcuts, collecting drinks along the way to satisfy your thirst and push yourself to crazy speeds across 16 different tracks to reach the store before it closes!



KEY CONCEPT

- You can live the dream of racing on a shopping cart at crazy speeds (risk free)
- If you're afraid to do it alone, you can play with 3 friends online
- Collect the drinks along the track to refill the stamina
- The store is closing; you'd better hurry up!

THINGS TO REMEMBER ONCE YOU'RE IN THE CART:

- First of all: I'ts not a car.
- The cart has no brakes. (deal with it)
- The cart has no engine. (push and sweat to move).
- The cart has no seatbelts. (we all know how it's going to end)
- The cart has no steering wheel (good luck in taming the beast)
- Last but not least: IT'S NOT A CAR.
You can do it!

841766737061740574.short_description: Step into the wonderful world of Slackers! Picture this: you and your friends run out of drinks and the store is closing! Hop in a shopping cart, the ultimate eco-friendly marvel, master the art of riding an unpredictable beast, discover shortcuts as you pave your path to glory!
841766737061740574.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Greek, Japanese, Korean, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Hindi

movies.name: Slackers Carts of Glory - Date Reveal Trailer
Slackers Carts of Glory - Gameplay Trailer

content_descriptors.notes: Our game is a lighthearted and cartoonish downhill shopping cart racing experience. While the tone is fun and playful, please be aware that there are depictions of blood during crashes and the gameplay involves dangerous and risky driving scenarios. Additionally, although the word 'beer' is never explicitly mentioned, the drink used to recharge stamina might be interpreted as beer.

800478233148784682.name: Make Way
800478233148784682.detailed_description:
Join Our Discord!


About the Game

Make Way is classic, top-down, multiplayer racing shifted up multiple gears.

Grab track pieces from a pick n mix menu and snap them together to build your first course. Dodge hazards, unleash weaponry, and avoid falling off the edge in a chaotic rush to the finish line, then bolt on new track pieces for the next round.

Scrap across ever-growing courses with increasingly perilous features until a winner is crowned before starting over with a brand-new course.

Build your course

Work together—or against one another—to quickly build tracks using a range of ridiculous pieces, including loops, seesaws, corkscrews, and even train crossings. Then add obstacles and power-ups. Ruin your friends’ race with a well-placed barrier or jettison them off the side of a curve with a crafty boost-pad.


Blow up the competition

Four racers jostle and shunt to cross checkpoints and reach the finish line. Obliterate opponents with a range of wacky weapons, including goo cannons and Tesla coils, but beware: each checkpoint acts as a respawn point and revenge is a dish best served via a giant mallet or rooftop-mounted shotgun…

Keep on truckin’

The finish line isn’t the finish! Add new track pieces after each round to create monstrously large courses, and score bonus points with your performance to take home the trophy.


Add to your collection

Unlock new track pieces and hazards for more dangerous course designs. Add new vehicles to your garage to romp to victory in style.

Key Features

  • Mix and match unique track pieces and hazards for near-endless course configurations
  • Fight for weapons and power-ups to gain the advantage
  • Unlock new track pieces and vehicles for wackier races
  • Up to four players, on the same screen or online with cross-platform multiplayer
  • Toggle traps and safety barriers on or off to make those twisty turns easier (or more perilous!) using fully customisable rulesets

  • Toggle traps and safety barriers on or off to make those twisty turns easier (or more perilous!) using fully customisable rulesets
800478233148784682.short_description: Speed around loops, dart through train crossings, drift around helter skelters, and unleash wacky weaponry in this modern take on classic top-down multiplayer racing games. The twist? You build the track.
800478233148784682.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
800478233148784682.reviews:
“One of the most fun and ridiculous games I have ever played”
10/10 – GameGrin

“The perfect party racer”
4/5 – TechRadar Gaming

“Whether you’re having a gathering with your friends or arranging an online games night, make sure Make Way is top of your playlist”
8/10 – GameSpew
